name: WP Travel Engine – Elementor Widgets | Create Travel Booking Website Using WordPress and Elementor
author: WP Travel Engine

sections.description:
The WP Travel Engine – Elementor Widgets provides 20+ Elementor widgets to create travel and tour booking agency websites using WP Travel Engine and Elementor.

WP Travel Engine Elementor Widgets allows you to create and modify travel booking websites with a visual touch, and it also comes with pre-designed templates to streamline your workflow.

If you are a travel entrepreneur, travel web developer or travel theme developer, you will find this plugin helpful. It brings together the two popular plugins, WP Travel Engine and Elementor, to create feature-rich travel websites without writing any code.

How to use WP Travel Engine Elementor Widgets

Creating Single Trip Pages with WP Travel Engine Elementor Widgets

USEFUL LINKS

Demo | Docs | Video Tutorial | Support| Facebook Group

WHY WP TRAVEL ENGINE – ELEMENTOR WIDGETS?

  • Create travel and tour booking agency websites.
  • Access 24 sets of Elementor widgets.
  • Adopts the visual styling of your existing theme.
  • Customizable to match your brand and preferences.
  • Get regular updates.
  • User-friendly interface.
  • Easily create trip pages with pre-designed templates.
  • Favorable support via our forum or support desk.

30 FREE ELEMENTOR WIDGETS AND COUNTING

  1. Trips – Display trips dynamically based on conditions (featured, latest, on sales and custom selection), with five layout options and numerous filters to choose from.
  2. Destinations – Display your destinations with three distinct layouts and numerous filtering options.
  3. Trip Types – Highlight different trip types using three layouts and numerous filtering options.
  4. Activities – Display your activities with three distinct layouts and numerous filtering options.
  5. Trip Search – Display the search filter in either horizontal or vertical orientation, and enhance it with search criteria like destination, duration, price, and activities.
  6. Advanced Trips 1 – Showcase tour packages in stunning masonry layouts with the image and trip information (title, location, price, duration etc.). Choose from 4 diverse layouts to match your unique style.
  7. Advanced Trips 2 – Showcase tour packages in masonry layouts, with the image and trip information displayed but with bottom pricing placement.
  8. Advanced Trips 3 – Showcase your tour packages in a visually appealing grid format on any Elementor page. Filter by latest, featured, or specific categories.
  9. Advanced Trips 4 – Showcase your tour packages in a grid format with the image and trip information (title, price, duration, etc.) placed within the image.
  10. Trips Accordion – Display multiple trips in an interactive vertical accordion. Hover on the card, and it will automatically expand to show the content inside.
  11. Trips Module 1 – Highlight your desired multiple trips in visually appealing grid layouts. This widget comes with 2 predefined layouts.
  12. Trips Module 2 – Showcase your trip in three distinct layouts. Choose from grid layouts with a mix of horizontal and vertical placements, or select a rectangle or circle for your thumbnail images.
  13. Trips Module 3 – Showcase your trips in two pre-designed tiles. ​​Place one trip in the spotlight with a larger image to capture your readers’ attention instantly.
  14. Trips List – Present your trips in style with customizable titles, images, and categories. This widget offers multiple layouts to perfectly fit your homepage or category pages.

  15. Featured Trip – Display a featured trip with prominent discounts, destination information and booking details in a visually appealing card format.

    Elementor widgets for trip pages:

  16. Trip Booking – Showcase essential trip details, including price, discounts, highlights, availability button and enquiry forms.
  17. Trip Breadcrumbs – Guide users seamlessly through your website using intuitive trip breadcrumbs.
  18. Trip Carousel – Display multiple tour images attractively in a carousel format.
  19. Trip Cost Excludes – Display the trip exclusions using customizable icons and styles.
  20. Trip Cost Includes – Display the trip inclusions using customizable icons and styles.
  21. Trip Duration – Display trip duration in vertical or horizontal layouts.
  22. Trip Enquiry – Display the trip enquiry form with options to hide title, labels, and trip name while customizing its content colors and background.
  23. Trip Facts – Display trip facts with customizable icons, positioned left, right, or top, and arranged in up to four columns.
  24. Trip FAQs – Address common queries with an FAQ section featuring customizable title tags and distinct style options.
  25. Trip Highlights – Showcase your trip highlights in an eye-catching format.
  26. Trip Itinerary – Offer detailed trip itineraries with expandable options and customizable icons.
  27. Trip Map – Integrate interactive maps with adjustable location, zoom, and height settings.
  28. Trip Overview – Display a concise overview of your trip for quick insights.
  29. Trip Title – Customize trip titles with varying heading levels and alignment options.

  30. Trip Related Trips – Showcase other related trips with three distinct layouts and filters.

    The following widgets require premium add-ons of WP Travel Engine plugin:

  31. Trip Ratings – Display ratings with adjustable star gaps and options to control star and text visibility.
  32. Trip Review Form – Add the trip review form with varying heading levels and customization options.
  33. Trip Reviews – Show trip reviews with options to hide elements like average rating, overall rating, reviews, review gallery, date of experience, etc.
  34. Trip Fixed Starting Date – Highlight specific departure dates with customizable labels and clear table headers for easy reference.

Check the demo of Elementor Addons for WP Travel Engine

FREE TRAVEL THEMES COMPATIBLE WITH WP TRAVEL ELEMENTOR WIDGETS PLUGIN

  • Travel Monster by WP Travel Engine
  • Travel Agency by Rara Themes
  • Travel Explorer by WP Travel Engine
  • Prime Travel by WP Travel Engine
  • Travel Muni by WP Travel Engine

PREMIUM TRAVEL THEMES COMPATIBLE WITH WP TRAVEL ELEMENTOR WIDGETS PLUGIN

  • Travel Monster Pro by WP Travel Engine
  • Travel Agency Pro by Rara Themes

ABOUT WP TRAVEL ENGINE

WP Travel Engine is a complete travel and tour booking WordPress plugin. Using the WP Travel Engine, you can create SEO-friendly websites that increase bookings, inquiries and AOV. It is easy to use and set up without writing any code.

WP Travel Engine has everything you need to start selling tours – from creating complete itineraries to collecting payments.

CHECK THE DEMO OF THE WP TRAVEL ENGINE

All Add-ons | Travel and Tour Themes | Video Tutorials | User Documentation

GET HELP

We have created step-by-step tutorials about using WP Travel Engine. You will find the answer to most of your questions in the tutorials below.

  • Video Tutorials
  • Text Documentation
  • WP Travel Engine Youtube Channel

If you cannot find the answer to your questions, we encourage you to contact our support team via support ticket.

We also have an active Facebook Community of WP Travel Engine, where we discuss building and marketing travel websites. We encourage you to join the community.

FAQs

Can I use the plugin without WP Travel Engine?

No, you cannot use the WP Travel Engine – Elementor Widgets plugin without WP Travel Engine. The plugin is designed to work with WP Travel Engine and requires the core plugin to be installed and activated.

Does it work with any theme?

Yes, the WP Travel Engine – Elementor Widgets plugin is compatible with most WordPress themes. However, a few themes that have been heavily modified might not be compatible.

Is WP Travel Engine – Elementor Widgets plugin, fully free?

Yes, the WP Travel Engine – Elementor Widgets plugin is fully free.

What are the requirements to use WP Travel Engine – Elementor Widgets plugin?

To use this plugin, you need to have the latest version of WordPress, the WP Travel Engine plugin and the Elementor plugin installed and activated.

Will it slow down my site speed?

The plugin is optimized for speed and performance, so it will not slow down your site speed.
sections.installation:
Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select wte-elementor-widgets.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download wte-elementor-widgets.zip
  2. Extract the wte-elementor-widgets directory to your computer
  3. Upload the wte-elementor-widgets directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.changelog:
1.3.5 – 23st August, 2024

  • Feature: Added 10 new widgets to accommodate different layouts for the trips.
  • Feature: Added an import button in the Elementor editor page for easy import of custom templates.

1.3.4 – 30th July, 2024

  • Fix: Itinerary toggle issue.
  • Compatible update for WP Travel Engine 6.0+

1.3.3 – 17th May, 2024

  • Fix: Resolved an issue that arose due to the removal of the rich text editor on the highlights widget.
  • Enhancement: Improved code for better performance and stability.

1.3.2 – 6th May, 2024

  • Enhancement: Added responsive options for Trips per row in the Trips and Terms widgets.
  • Enhancement: Existing trip widgets have been improved with adjustments to their settings. This includes adding new options or removing unnecessary ones, making configuration easier and more focused.
  • Removed: Removed trip title widget in favor of the native Elementor Title widget.
  • Feature: Trip Widgets are now available within Elementor’s Theme Builder.

1.3.1 – 14th September, 2023

  • Fix: Compatibility updates for Elementor.

1.3.0 – 14th August, 2023

  • Feature: Added 19 new widgets for a single trip page.
  • Enhancement: Added slider option for taxonomy widgets.

1.2.4 – 19th June, 2023

  • Feature: Added option to display trips by choosing taxonomy.

1.2.3 – 8th June, 2023

  • Fix: Added missing translation.
  • Feature: Added icon uploader feature to trip search widget.

1.2.2 – 31st May, 2023

  • Compatibility updates for WordPress 6.2

1.2.1 – 29th November, 2022

  • Tweak: The labels can be set for both singular and plural number of items taxonomies terms.
  • Fix: Layout Issues in widgets in some cases.
  • Minor Bug Fixes

1.2.0 – 11th November, 2022

  • Feature: Adds style tab for all the widgets to provide more customisation
  • Refinements
  • Minor Bug Fixes

1.1.0 – 24th June, 2022

  • Feature: Adds slider option to the Trips Elementor Widget.
  • Minor Bug Fixes

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
